attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a 21 year old female disabled person I have just found out I am not entitled to incapacity benefit due to me not having paid enough national insurance stamps. This is because I have always tried to work in the last 6years since I became disabled even if for only 1hour a week. Because I didn't want to rely on benefits I am now being penalised! 
I find this shocking and I know there are many more people out there in my situation. 
So if you pay taxes and want them to go to someone deserving or you are in the same situation please sign this petition.
